title: Mouse DPI
body:
to get to the point, my mouse's DPI (basically sensitivity) keeps decreasing by itself during my games in LoL. Have no idea why, and it;s only this new mouse I've been having problems (it's a cheap wireless one from Ebay). Luckily this mouse comes with the DPI button, where you just press it and there are 3 settings for the sensitivity, but if anyone knows the problem and how to fix it, I'd appreciate it

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
